guid.comments: string. guid, unique only within the mod. Will be turned into GUID 'mod:'+$yourModId+':'+$guid
name: Level-Up Rewards
name.comments: string. Reward name (not localized) to be displayed when the rewards are distributed.
comboType.comments: (Optional) int (AND=0 | OR=1) [default=AND(0)]. Determines how the reward options are given to the player.
rewardOptions.comments: List<RewardData::GUID>. List of rewards to give to the player. Cannot be empty.
